tika-vin10t4:13: Ratticchedo kathaṃ vutto, vattabhedo kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t4:37: Oṇojanaṃ tathā bhattaṃ, labhate pañcime pana.
tika-vin10t4:44: Etāni pana cattāri, vuttāni ca mahesinā;
tika-vin10t4:51: Etesaṃ tu catunnampi, samattā samathā matā.
tika-vin10t4:59: Vivādo sammati dvīhi, anuvādo catūhi ca;
tika-vin10t4:77: Lajjī alajjī bāloti, kena sakkā vijānituṃ?
tika-vin10t4:83: Nāpajjati ca sañcicca, āpattiṃ na ca gūhati;
tika-vin10t4:92: Alajjī sānuvādo ca, asucī kammato ca yo;
tika-vin10t4:101: Yathā ca tiṇapaṇṇena, channaṃ gūthañca muttakaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:102: Na ca vāyati duggandhaṃ, vūpasammati taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t4:105: Diṭṭhāvikammikañceva, yo ca tattha na hoti taṃ.
tika-vin10t4:112: Rukkhe vā pana kuṭṭevā, aṭṭāne thambhakesu vā;
tika-vin10t4:119: Kataṃ taṃ mallakaṃ nāma, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:125: Vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, katakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:130: Osaṇheyya sake kese, yo hatthaphaṇakena vā;
tika-vin10t4:139: Ādāse udapatte vā, yattha katthaci attano;
tika-vin10t4:145: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t4:146: Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:154: ‘‘Passissāmī’’ti naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā pana vāditaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:155: Vihārato vihāraṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:158: Ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā, passatopi ca vīthiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:160: Kesā dīghā na dhāreyyā, yo dhāreyyassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:161: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:163: Nakhe nāsikalomāni, dīghāni na tu dhāraye;
tika-vin10t4:164: Na ca vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ vā, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t4:166: Kappāpeyya visuṃ massuṃ, dāṭhikaṃ vā ṭhapeyya yo;
tika-vin10t4:167: Saṃharāpeyya vā lomaṃ, sambādhe tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:169: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kese kattarikāya vā;
tika-vin10t4:176: Na doso chindato aṅgaṃ, mocentassa ca lohitaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:181: Na bhuñje na pive naggo, na khāde na ca sāyaye;
tika-vin10t4:182: Na dade na ca gaṇheyya, na gaccheyyapi añjasaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:185: Parikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ, na naggena ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t4:190: Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ, bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t4:194: Ekamañcepi vā tesaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:197: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyya, palitaṃ na ca gāhaye.
tika-vin10t4:202: Agilāno sace bhikkhu, chattaṃ dhāreyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:211: Lokāyataṃ na vāceyya, na ca taṃ pariyāpuṇe;
tika-vin10t4:214: Na ca vaṭṭati dhāretuṃ, sabbā cāmaribījanī;
tika-vin10t4:215: Na cālimpeyya dāyaṃ vā, na ca lañje mukhampi ca.
tika-vin10t4:226: Lasuṇaṃ na ca khādeyya, sace nākallako siyā;
tika-vin10t4:236: Na ca dhāraṇiyā uṇhī, sabbā bāhiralomikā.
tika-vin10t4:256: Dīghato ca diyaḍḍhaṃ vā, dvihatthanti kurundiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:265: Suddhaṃ tamālapattañca, paṇṇesu na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:272: Yadetaṃ tividhaṃ tūlaṃ, bhisiyaṃ taṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:273: Missaṃ tamālapattaṃ tu, sabbattha pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:276: Kārentassa karoto vā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:278: Jātakaṃ pana vatthuṃ vā, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t4:281: Samānāsaniko nāma, dvīhi vassehi yo pana;
tika-vin10t4:282: Vuḍḍho vā daharo vāpi, vassenekena vā pana.
tika-vin10t4:287: Heṭṭhā dīghāsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, yaṃ pahoti nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t4:288: Ekamañcepi pīṭhe vā, dve nisīdanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:301: Pātova gāhite añño, bhikkhu senāsane pana;
tika-vin10t4:302: Sace yācati āgantvā, vattabbo gāhitanti so.
tika-vin10t4:308: Gahetvā kappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, datvā tassattano pana.
tika-vin10t4:311: Gāhitaṃ gaṇha’’iccevaṃ, vatvā gacchati so disaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:313: Uppabbajati ce tattha, gataṭṭhāne, na labbhati;
tika-vin10t4:314: Gahetuṃ tassa sampattaṃ, saṅghikaṃyeva taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t4:316: Manusse sammukhā tattha, paṭicchāpeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t4:319: Ārāmo ca vihāro ca, vatthūni duvidhassapi;
tika-vin10t4:323: Vāsi pharasu kuddālo, kuṭhārī ca nikhādanaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:325: Valli veḷu tiṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ, muñjapabbajameva ca;
tika-vin10t4:326: Mattikā dārubhaṇḍañca, pañcamaṃ tu yathāha ca.
tika-vin10t4:337: Bhikkhunā garubhaṇḍaṃ tu, saṅghena hi gaṇena vā;
tika-vin10t4:354: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ taṃ, lohabhaṇḍaṃ tu kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t4:361: Na doso saṅghike atthi, gihīnaṃ santakesu vā.
tika-vin10t4:379: Kiñci saṅghassa dinnaṃ ce, taṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:381: Nhāpitassa ca saṇḍāso, kattarī ca mahattarī;
tika-vin10t4:384: Valli saṅghassa dinnā vā, tatthajātāpi rakkhitā;
tika-vin10t4:390: Nāḷikerassa hīre vā, vāke vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t4:393: Veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā, rakkhito tatthajātako;
tika-vin10t4:399: Muñjādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, muṭṭhimattaṃ garuṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t4:403: Mattikā pakatī vāpi, pañcavaṇṇā sudhāpi vā.
tika-vin10t4:405: Silesādīsu vā kiñci, dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:411: Rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ vāpi, gahetabbaṃ tu gaṇhatā;
tika-vin10t4:412: Samakaṃ atirekaṃ vā, datvā phātikameva vā.
tika-vin10t4:439: Bījanī pacchi caṅkoṭaṃ, sabbā sammuñjanī garu.
tika-vin10t4:441: Yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yo koci kaṭasārako;
tika-vin10t4:459: Patto kañcanako ceva, thālakaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca;
tika-vin10t4:481: Patto avassikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, likhitvā ṭhapitopi ca.
tika-vin10t4:487: Gahetuṃ labhati taṃ pacchā, sāmaṇerassa pāḷiyā.
tika-vin10t4:490: Ajja so upasampanno, atītā ṭhitikā siyā.
tika-vin10t4:492: Sace pana salākā tu, laddhā bhattaṃ na taṃdine;
tika-vin10t4:493: Laddhaṃ, punadine tassa, gāhetabbaṃ, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t4:496: Visuñhi ṭhitikā katvā, dātabbā tu salākikā.
tika-vin10t4:499: Laddhamuttaribhaṅgaṃ vā, na laddhaṃ bhattameva vā.
tika-vin10t4:501: Yena yena hi yaṃ yaṃ tu, na laddhaṃ, tassa tassa ca;
tika-vin10t4:502: Taṃ taṃ punadine cāpi, gāhetabbanti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:528: Oguṇṭhanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, sīse cīvarameva vā;
tika-vin10t4:529: Na hi tena ca dhotabbā, pādā pānīyavārinā.
tika-vin10t4:555: Iccevaṃ pana vattabbaṃ, deyyaṃ senāsanampi ca.
tika-vin10t4:563: Sahasā pavise nāpi, sahasā na ca nikkhame;
tika-vin10t4:573: Nakkhattaṃ tena yogo ca, jānitabbā disāpi ca.
tika-vin10t4:578: Sahasā ubbhajitvā vā, na ca vaccakuṭiṃ vise;
tika-vin10t4:579: Ukkāsitvā bahi ṭhatvā, pavise saṇikaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t4:581: Vaccaṃ na nitthunantena, kātabbaṃ pana bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t4:582: Khādato dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:584: Vaccaṃ pana na kātabbaṃ, bahiddhā vaccadoṇiyā;
tika-vin10t4:588: Chaḍḍeyya na ca pāteyya, kheḷaṃ passāvadoṇiyā.
tika-vin10t4:593: Nācameyya sace vaccaṃ, katvā yo salile sati;
tika-vin10t4:596: Sasaddaṃ nācametabbaṃ, katvā capu capūti ca;
tika-vin10t4:603: Chaḍḍeyya kumbhi rittā ce, kumbhiṃ pūreyya vārinā.
tika-vin10t4:605: Anajjhiṭṭho hi vuḍḍhena, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t4:606: Dhammaṃ na ca bhaṇe, pañhaṃ, na puccheyya na vissaje.
tika-vin10t4:612: Anāpucchā hi sajjhāyo, na kātabbo kadācipi.
tika-vin10t4:614: Uddesopi na kātabbo, paripucchāya kā kathā;
tika-vin10t4:615: Na ca dhammo kathetabbo, bhikkhunā dhammacakkhunā.
tika-vin10t4:617: Na dīpo vijjhāpetabbo, kātabbo vā na ceva so;
tika-vin10t4:621: Tampi cīvarakaṇṇena, kāyena na ca ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t4:623: Purato neva therānaṃ, nhāyeyya na panūpari;
tika-vin10t4:624: Uttaraṃ otarantānaṃ, dade maggaṃ, na ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t4:632: Tasmā hi vattaṃ pūreyya, jinaputto vicakkhaṇo;
tika-vin10t4:637: Kāyaṃ ūruṃ thanaṃ vāpi, vivaritvāna bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t4:638: Attano aṅgajātaṃ vā, bhikkhussa na ca dassaye.
tika-vin10t4:640: Bhikkhunā saha yaṃ kiñci, sampayojentiyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t4:641: Tato bhāsantiyā bhikkhuṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:643: Na ca bhikkhuniyā dīghaṃ, dhāreyya kāyabandhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:646: Vilīvena ca paṭṭena, cammapaṭṭena vā tathā;
tika-vin10t4:649: Na phāsukā nametabbā, dukkaṭaṃ tu namentiyā;
tika-vin10t4:652: Hatthaṃ vā hatthakocchaṃ vā, pādaṃ vā mukhamūrukaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:653: Koṭṭāpeti sace tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:655: Na mukhaṃ limpitabbaṃ tu, na cuṇṇetabbameva ca;
tika-vin10t4:658: Aṅgarāgo na kātabbo, mukharāgopi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t4:659: Avaṅgaṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, na kātabbaṃ visesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:662: Ṭhātabbaṃ na ca sāloke, sanaccaṃ na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t4:665: Suraṃ vā pana maṃsaṃ vā, paṇṇaṃ vā vikkiṇantiyā.
tika-vin10t4:667: Vaḍḍhiṃ vāpi vaṇijjaṃ vā, payojetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t4:668: Tirīṭaṃ kañcukaṃ vāpi, yadi dhāreti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:670: Dāso vā pana dāsī vā, tathā kammakaropi vā;
tika-vin10t4:673: Na ca bhikkhuniyā sabba-nīlādiṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t4:674: Dhāretabbaṃ, na dhāreyya, sabbaṃ namatakampi ca.
tika-vin10t4:679: Dūratova ca passitvā, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t4:682: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca passitvā, pattaṃ bhikkhaṃ carantiyā;
tika-vin10t4:694: Yassā pabbajjakāle tu, gabbho vuṭṭhāti itthiyā;
tika-vin10t4:695: Putto yadi ca tassāpi, dātabbā dutiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t4:698: Maṇḍetumpi ure katvā, setuṃ labhati sā pana.
tika-vin10t4:700: Ṭhapetvā sahaseyyaṃ tu, tasmiṃ dutiyikāya hi;
tika-vin10t4:703: Vibbhameneva sā hoti, yasmā idha abhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t4:712: Na vaccakuṭiyā vacco, kātabbo yāya kāyaci;
tika-vin10t4:715: Na ca vaṭṭati sabbattha, pallaṅkena nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t4:718: Na ca bhikkhuniyāraññe, vatthabbaṃ tu kathañcana;
tika-vin10t4:719: Atitthe naratitthe vā, nhāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:722: Nhāyeyya paṭisote vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:725: Dinnaṃ abhutvā aññassa, dentiyā pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:749: Cīvarādiparikkhāraṃ, saṅgho yaṃ deti tassa hi.
tika-vin10t4:752: Evaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ tu, hoti taṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:755: Sammuti ceva dānañca, paṭiggāho ca sattamo.
tika-vin10t4:761: Tassa nissāraṇā vuttā, yā sā nissāraṇāti hi.
tika-vin10t4:787: Sammuti nāma sīmādi, sā pañcadasadhā matā;
tika-vin10t4:812: Imesaṃ tu vasā ñeyyā, dasekā samanubhāsanā.
tika-vin10t4:823: Sesāni apaloketvā, kātuṃ pana na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t4:844: Na parāmasati vatthuñca, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t4:846: Na parāmasati ñattiṃ vā, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t4:850: Na parāmasati vatthuṃ vā, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t4:856: Vuttā uposathe tāva, khandhake sabbaso mayā.
tika-vin10t4:859: Chando ca na panānīto, paṭikkosanti sammukhā.
tika-vin10t4:861: Evaṃ tivaṅgiko doso, parisāya vasā siyā;
tika-vin10t4:862: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chando ca na panāgato.
tika-vin10t4:865: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chandopi ca samāhaṭo.
tika-vin10t4:870: Catutthikā siyuṃ dosā, dasa dve parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t4:871: Evaṃ dvādasadhā ettha, kammāni hi vipajjare.
tika-vin10t4:876: Suṇātha nipuṇe pañhe, gūḷhatthe bhaṇato mama.
tika-vin10t4:878: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattiṃyeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t4:879: Kathañca paṭiggaṇhanto, na gaṇhanto kathaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t4:885: Asamāpattilābhissa, kā ca nāmassa sā bhave.
tika-vin10t4:887: Garukaṃ bhaṇato saccaṃ, alikaṃ bhaṇato siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t4:888: Lahuṃ saccaṃ bhaṇantassa, musā ca bhaṇato garuṃ.
tika-vin10t4:890: Pavisanto ca ārāmaṃ, āpajjati na nikkhamaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:891: Nikkhamantova āpatti, na ceva pavisaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t4:898: Āpajjati ca dhārento, adhārento tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t4:899: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti? Bhaṇāhi me.
tika-vin10t4:902: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātāpitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t4:904: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:905: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhave;
tika-vin10t4:912: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, na so pārājiko kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:917: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t4:918: Chiddaṃ gehassa nevatthi, kathaṃ methunato cuto;
tika-vin10t4:924: Sabbattha nipuṇā dhīrā, ime pañhe bhaṇanti te.
tika-vin10t4:931: Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t4:932: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:935: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:940: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin10t4:941: Bhinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:947: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:949: Pattassa pariyante vā, tathā pattamukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t4:950: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:956: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin10t4:961: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vā, aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t4:962: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:970: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:972: Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin10t4:973: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:975: Saṅkhena maṇinā vāpi, aññenapi ca kenaci;
tika-vin10t4:976: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin10t4:978: Cīvaraṃ doṇiyaṃ katvā, nāpi ghaṭṭeyya muṭṭhinā;
tika-vin10t4:979: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:981: Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t4:984: Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t4:985: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin10t4:987: Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin10t4:991: Na doso koci tatthassa, kātuṃ makaradantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:994: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:996: Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1002: Akkhīni tattha dassetvā, koṭṭite pana kā kathā;
tika-vin10t4:1003: Kakkaṭakkhīni vā tattha, uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1005: Ghaṭaṃ deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā, makarassa mukhampi vā;
tika-vin10t4:1006: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin10t4:1008: Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1015: Rajjuyo na ca vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1018: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1021: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1023: Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
tika-vin10t4:1033: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin10t4:1035: Tādisaṃ pana ghaṃsitvā, veṭhetvā suttakena vā;
tika-vin10t4:1036: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t4:1038: Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin10t4:1045: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1048: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t4:1051: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1054: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1057: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1060: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t4:1068: Tathā pattapidhāne ca, tālavaṇṭe ca bījane;
tika-vin10t4:1082: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, na uddissa davaṃ kare;
tika-vin10t4:1085: Kāyaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ vā, ūruṃ vā na tu dassaye;
tika-vin10t4:1086: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu tā vāpi, na siñce udakādinā.
tika-vin10t4:1089: Dukkaṭaṃ puna dātabbaṃ, gīvā naṭṭhepi jajjare.
tika-vin10t4:1091: Codito so sace tehi, bhikkhūhi na dadeyyataṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1095: Davā silaṃ pavijjhanto, dukkaṭā na ca muccati.
tika-vin10t4:1103: Na ca bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, sampayojeyya kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t4:1106: Bhikkhunīnaṃ have bhikkhu, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t4:1107: Āpattiṃ vā sace tāsaṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1113: Aggaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ vā, pattādīsupyayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t4:1122: Pakkhipitvāna pākatthaṃ, cāletuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1125: Tattha cādīnavaṃ tassa, vattuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t4:1128: Kataṃ nissāya dussīlaṃ, tayā viharatā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t4:1130: Bhattagge yāgupāne ca, antogāme ca vīthiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1133: Sutto khādañca bhuñjanto, vaccaṃ muttampi vā karaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1139: Ekādasa abhabbā ca, garukaṭṭhā ca pañcime;
tika-vin10t4:1140: Vandato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bāvīsati ca puggale.
tika-vin10t4:1143: Dhammavādī ca sambuddho, vandanīyā tayo ime.
tika-vin10t4:1148: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ panekassa, dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t4:1157: Tattha appaṭikammā ca, yā ca vuṭṭhānagāminī;
tika-vin10t4:1176: Tatraṭṭho pana so dvinnaṃ, kammaṃ kopeti saṅghikaṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1191: Vuttā samaṇakappā ca, pañca, pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-vin10t4:1193: Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ, vidhiṃ paññattiyā pana;
tika-vin10t4:1202: Nidānaṃ tattha vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1206: Satāni hi cha ūnāni, tīṇi sāvatthiyā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1208: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t4:1209: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhagge pakāsitā.
tika-vin10t4:1215: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti te.
tika-vin10t4:1232: Idaṃ catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ, ñatvā tattha patiṭṭhito;
tika-vin10t4:1263: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, na vaḍḍhetabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t4:1269: Viññāṇaṃ nevasaññā ca, dasa dve bhāvagocarā.
tika-vin10t4:1277: Tāni dvādasa bhiyyo ca, ānāpānasatīpi ca;
tika-vin10t4:1278: Sabbaso terasa vāpi, brahmaloke na jāyare.
tika-vin10t4:1281: Aññe pana na jāyanti, sabbe jāyanti mānuse.
tika-vin10t4:1283: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā ca dasāsubhā;
tika-vin10t4:1292: Bhavanti hi abhiññāṇaṃ, kasiṇāni dasāpi ca;
tika-vin10t4:1317: Cariyāyānukūlaṃ tu, tesu yaṃ attano pana.
tika-vin10t4:1331: Tiṇṇaṃ tesaṃ vavatthāne, kate ettāvatā pana;
tika-vin10t4:1332: Tiṇṇaṃ pana ca saccānaṃ, vavatthānaṃ kataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t4:1346: Teneva ca upāyena, bhāvento so punappunaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1355: Yadi akkharabandhe vā, ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin10t4:1361: Sabbassa pana lokassa, gāme sampiṇḍite viya.
tika-vin10t4:1396: Yathā siddhimayaṃ patto, antarāyaṃ vinā tathā;
tika-vin10t4:1406: Karontena pattaṃ mayā yaṃ tu puññaṃ;
tika-vin10t4:1411: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racitoyaṃ vinayavinicchayo.
